Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: Head includes allow formatters to bring their own scripts and stylesheets. We present a formatter for the demo article that uses some special script. In its formatter configuration we add this script as head include, moreover, we add some extra styles.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: See an example formatter that adds scripts and styles to a page.

Link.LinkText: Read more about head includes here.
